itemDescription: youngest child of Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, and Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge

wikipedia_page.main: Prince Louis of Cambridge ( LOO-ee; Louis Arthur Charles; born 23 April 2018) is a member of the British royal family. He is the third and youngest child and second son of Prince William, Duke of Cambridge, and Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge. He is fifth in the line of succession to the British throne.

response: *2018 – Prince Louis of Cambridge, member of the British royal family
* April 23 – Prince Louis of Cambridge, fifth in line to the throne of the United Kingdom
In 2011, William was made Duke of Cambridge preceding his marriage to Catherine Middleton. The couple have three children: Prince George, Princess Charlotte, and Prince Louis of Cambridge.
